component.name: Oscar the Grouch
component.requirement: CENTCOM shall improve the waste management logistics by 50%
component.status: Delivery of trash cans to CENTCOM will be delayed due to sensor backorder
Bluetooth vulnerability can be exposed to security threat
Elmo has successfully tested trash can load testing
component.description: Project "Oscar the Grouch" aims to put smart garbage cans by the desks of all analysts world wide. These bluetooth enabled garbage cans will provide real time alerting when the trash cans reach capacity and can provide REST API's for integration with mobile applications
